fieldDescription:
Each use of the full-spectrum sweep will cost this many volatiles. If set to 0, activation is free.
This setting has no effect if passive mode is enabled.
Whenever entering a system that has been scanned but still has undiscovered objects, show the remaining quantity as a sidebar message.
All systems are scanned by default, removing the need to activate the ability. Results are shown even when entering new areas for the first time.
